actions.text: On agreeing to the Grayson amendment (A010) as modified Failed by recorded vote: 209 - 210 (Roll no. 301).
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Grayson amendment (A010) as modified Failed by recorded vote: 209 - 210 (Roll no. 301).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A010) offered by Mr. Grayson.

description: An amendment numbered 10 printed in Part B of House Report 113-131 to ensure that no portion of this legislation is construed as affecting the right of any state to prohibit the management, leasing, developing, and use of lands (including offshore oil drilling) beneath navigable waters within its boundaries.
